name: PROJECT IGNITION
description:
Fuel is valuable. You're not.

In this game, your fuel is your weapon. Drop pools of flammable gasoline behind you, and then run back over it to set it ablaze! Be sure to keep an eye on your gas gauge and find a gas pump when it gets too low. With a Mad Max inspired theme and Tron-like game-play, driving through a scarred wasteland has never been more fun. 

Controller recommended.
KEYBOARD CONTROLS:
WS - gas/reverse
AD - steer
F - drop fuel
QE - rotate view
CONTROLLER:
L/R trigger - gas/reverse
L stick - steer
bottom button - drop fuel
L/R bumper - rotate view
(DEBUG:)
R - force move
T/Y, U, I - various screenshake things
O - turn off dynamic cam
G - add fuel/health
H - restart room
L - spawn enemy
Z/X - adjust view angle
C/V - zoom in/out
N - switch from keyboard to controller
M - force set enemies' targets

Made for TigerDev Fall 2018
